subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis’s availability for Sunday’s game in Pittsburgh was cast into doubt Monday when the Jets announced that he sustained a “mild” concussion in their season-opening victory against Buffalo.
snippet: Darrelle Revis’s availability for Sunday’s game in Pittsburgh was cast into doubt Monday when the Jets announced that he sustained a “mild” concussion in their season-opening victory against Buffalo.
